episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The Aum series continues with the blossoming of the cult as they move into full-on warfare mode with the development of their very first biolab and their first two thankfully unsuccessful terror attacks.

episodes.title: Episode 218: The Aum Shinrikyo Death Cult Part I - Mountain Wizards
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's a return to cults with one of the most bizarre we've ever covered, the Aum Shinrikyo death cult of Japan! In this first part we cover how the group started as a fairly innocent scam focused on increasing the psychic powers of nerds and how leader Shoko Asahara was able to turn that into a full blown cult bent on Harumageddon.

episodes.title: Episode 217: Roswell Part II - It's a Balloon
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's time for the (alleged) debunking on the wrap up to our Roswell series, as well as alternate theories blaming everyone from the Russians to the Nazis to God to the Devil.

episodes.title: Roswell
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the grandaddy of them all on this week's Last Podcast with the story of the Roswell Incident, in which, allegedly, a manned spacecraft of unknown origin crashed in the New Mexico desert in 1947, changing the world forever.

episodes.title: Episode 215: Paranormal Photography
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the world of paranormal photography and technology on this week's Last Podcast! Today we'll be covering "scientist"/wolf-medicine shaman David Rountree, a slew of possibly authentic photographs of ghosts, and the drunken unemployed bellhop/actual paranormal phenomenon Ted Serios.

episodes.title: Episode 214 - Chemtrails
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's rural America's favorite conspiracy theory on today's Last Podcast as we cover every facet of chemtrails from weather control to mind control and of course, the prevention of the next stage of human evolution.

episodes.title: Episode 213: Dean Corll Part IV - A Country Boondoggle
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In the conclusion to our Dean Corll series, the man himself meets a bloody end at the hands of one of his accomplices and police discover one of the most gruesome crime scenes in American history and completely screw it up.

episodes.title: Episode 212: Dean Corll Part III - 18 Inch Double
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The main leg of the Dean Corll murder and torture spree begins with the addition of his second accomplice, Wayne Henley, which eventually ended in the deaths of a further 18 boys, bringing the total to 29 in less than three years.

episodes.title: Episode 211: Dean Corll Part II - The Ready Sled
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The Dean Corll series continues with the introduction of his infamous torture board and the boat shed where he disposed of the bodies of dozens of boys, as well as his first accomplice in 29 murders, teenager David Brooks.

episodes.title: Episode 210: Dean Corll Part One - The Pouting Room
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's teenage boy mass-murderer Dean Corll up next on the Heavy Hitter series as we cover his childhood in the Klan-ridden hellhole that is Vidor, TX and his career at the Corll Candy Company of Houston where he earned his reputation as the Candyman.

episodes.title: Episode 209: Ghost Cats of the South
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Join us this week as we explore the world of ghost cats, specifically those located in the South.

episodes.title: Episode 208: David Bowie and the Occult
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's a tribute to the greatest magician of the 20th century on this week's Last Podcast as we cover Bowie's occult obsessions during the 1970s and how those pepper-milk cocaine fueled days tie in with Bowie's very last album, Blackstar.

episodes.title: Episode 207: Leonard Lake and Charles Ng Part IV - Roughly Ten Cats
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the conclusion to the saga of Leonard Lake and Charles Ng on this week's Last Podcast as we cover the pair's inevitable arrest, the gruesome discoveries made after their capture, and the bizarre trial of Charles Ng.

episodes.title: Episode 206: Leonard Lake and Charles Ng Part III - Jocular Type Talk
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: On part three of four of our series on Leonard Lake and Charles Ng, we get into what actually went on in the bunker that Leonard Lake had spent most of his life trying to build. That includes the videotapes, the layout, and the horrifying murder of an entire family. Warning: it gets rough.

episodes.title: Episode 205: The Detective Popcorn Christmas Special
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary:
A brutal homicide. A desperate cop. And a BUTTERY SONG. It's the Detective Popcorn CHRISTMAS SPECIAL! Join Detective Popcorn and a sleigh-full of surprise guests as they unravel the mysteries of friendship, family, and MURDER.

Not familiar with Detective Popcorn? Listen to parts one and two of our BTK Killer series for a buttery introduction. And if you’d like to support the show (and receive some bonus goodies) please visit our Patreon page!

Starring: Henry Zebrowski, Ben Kissel, Ed Larson, Jackie Zebrowski, Marcus Parks.

episodes.title: Episode 204: Leonard Lake and Charles Ng Part II - What I Bring To Friendship
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The series on two of America's most despicable killers continues with Leonard Lake finding the perfect location to pull off the evil and twisted Operation Miranda and Charles Ng fully joining up with his murder partner in California.

episodes.title: Episode 203: Leonard Lake and Charles Ng Part I - Operation Brownie Pockets
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's two of America's lesser known serial killers this week as we cover Leonard Lake and Charles Ng, partners in crime who tortured and murdered up to 25 men, women, and children over just one year in the early eighties. There's also a unicorn.

episodes.title: Episode 202: H.H. Holmes Part III - Professional Uncle
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's time for the conclusion of our series on H.H. Holmes as America's first urban serial killer goes full Bluebeard by way of safe suffocation on his way out of Chicago and comes close to murdering an entire family in a life insurance scam, the scheme for which the man eventually goes down for.

episodes.title: Episode 201: H.H. Holmes Part II - Nothing But Trouble
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Our series on H.H. Holmes continues with the actual construction of his murder castle, exactly how he used it to kill and dispose of his victims, and the terrible, vicious things that happened within.

episodes.title: Episode 200: H.H. Holmes Part I - The Horrid Meat
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's H.H. Holmes, America's first urban serial killer on the 200th episode of the Last Podcast On The Left! Join us as we cover the transitionary hellhole that was America in the late 1800s and how H.H. Holmes, one of the most well-rounded psychopaths in modern history, was perfectly suited to rack up a body count of more than no less than 9 and no more than 200.

episodes.title: Episode 199: The Magick Series - The Left Hand Path
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The magick series continues with the Left Hand Path! Join us on this sex and semen filled journey as we explore Aleister Crowley's Thelema and his various adventures along the way, Anton LaVey's Church of Satan and how Michael Aquino tried to ruin everyone's good time, and how it all began in the west with one half-prude.

episodes.title: Episode 198: Halloween
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's a Halloween special on Last Podcast as we cover the origins of the holiday as an Irish deathfire festival known as All Hallow's Eve up till the 20th century, where it turned into a Detroit deathfire festival known as Devil's Night, with some children's riots and poisoned candy thrown in for good measure.

episodes.title: Episode 197: The Magick Series - The Right Hand Path
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In this first in our series on magick, we cover the Right Hand Path, aka nerd magic, including the Kaballah, Hermes Trismegistus, the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn, and everything you need to perform your very own Right Hand ritual!

episodes.title: Episode 196: Listener Stories II: You Do It
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: As per our Halloween tradition it's time for you the listener to call in and tell us your spooky stories! We got a great crop this year, including stories about cannibals, snake-handed Englishmen, singing closets, staring dogs, Skinwalker sisters, and more!

episodes.title: Episode 195: Listenerpasta III - He's So Cold
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: We're kicking off Halloween month with our third annual Listenerpasta episode! Tune in to hear us read Creepypasta written just for us. Includes demigods, Civil War ghosts,  flaming genitals, and more!

episodes.title: Episode 194: Son of Sam Part II - The Wicked King of Wicker
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The city of New York loses it's collective mind in part two of our Son of Sam series as the letters from the Chubby Behemoth himself start rolling in and his killings continue to their completion, plus we bring in connections to the mysterious Process Church of the Final Judgement.

episodes.title: Episode 193: Son of Sam Part One: Kill For My Master
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In the first of our two parter on David Berkowitz aka The Son of Sam, we cover the beginnings of David's life as a pudgy arson prone child in the Bronx to his eventual status as the man who held New York City hostage with his .44 caliber revolver throughout the first half of 1977.

episodes.title: Episode 192: Hollow Earth
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In a continuation of our Hollow Series, we're covering everything you would ever want to know about the phenomenon of the Hollow Earth, from the Secret Diaries of Admiral Richard Byrd to the Vrill-ya, the subterranean race of Aryans that the Nazis so fervently believed in.

episodes.title: Episode 191: 9/11 Part Three - Six Degrees of Baphomet
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In this, the last of our 9/11 series, we fully explore the magickal side of 9/11 and how it relates very strongly (almost too strongly) to Aleister Crowley, numerology, Ozzy, and something called The Opening of the Mouth Ceremony.

episodes.title: Episode 190 - 9/11 Part Two: The Conspiracy
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: On part two of our series we explain the grand overarching conspiracy of 9/11 from the rise of worse-than-Reptilian Dick Cheney to the now billion dollar industry that is the War on Terror and how it all came to be in between.

episodes.title: Episode 189: 9/11 Part One - The Day
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the first of our three part 9/11 series as we cover exclusively the actual events that happened both in the sky and on the ground in lower Manhattan on September 11th, 2001.

episodes.title: Episode 188: Dulce Part Two - Serious Business Mode
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The Dulce Wars come to an end on this week's episode as Thomas Castello's story of the conflict between humans, Reptilians, and Greys for the soul of humanity comes to a head.

episodes.title: Episode 187: The Dulce Facility Part One: Pronounced Kkhhah-sshh-fahsh-sst
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's time to go deep underground to the world's largest Reptillian Humanoid-Grey-Human collaborative facility in Dulce, NM as we discuss the horrific genetic experiments performed therein as well as the lunching habits of all three species.

episodes.title: Fairies
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's time to descend into Fairyland with the boys this week as we discuss the wide varieties of fairies, their practices, and why you should never eat their tiny cakes.

episodes.title: Henry Lee Lucas Part IV: I Belong To The Devil
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The saga of Henry Lee Lucas comes to an end as we cover his last (and possibly only) killing spree, the various well meaning but dead wrong Christians who helped him along his way, and his post-capture life as the favorite pet of the Texas Rangers.

episodes.title: Henry Lee Lucas Part III: The Hand of Death
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: On the third of what is now a four part series, we backtrack a bit and join Henry and Ottis as they spin a tale of the Satanic Floridian death cult that they supposedly served during their run of mayhem and murder called The Hand of Death.

episodes.title: Episode 183: Henry Lee Lucas Part Two - Highway Star
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: On the second part of our three part series on Henry Lee Lucas, we meet Henry's life partner in murder, the gigantic and terrifying Ottis Toole and follow the pair on their supposed and probably only half true cross-country killing spree.

episodes.title: Episode 182: Henry Lee Lucas Part One - From the Womb of a Whore
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the childhood of Henry Lee Lucas on the first of our three part series on the greatest drifter America ever produced. Follow the upbringing of the man who started off as the son of a prostitute and ended up with the highest confessed but not confirmed body count in American history.

episodes.title: Episode 181: Creepypasta 10 - Thumbers
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the tenth in our Creepypasta series as we read stories involving skin burning, eyeball popping, Pac Man, and thumbers, plus bonus 911 calls!

episodes.title: Episode 180: An Interview with Laurence R. Harvey
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In this special Last Podcast, Laurence R. Harvey, star of infamous The Human Centipede 2 and the emotional center of The Human Centipede 3, talks with us about how he got the part of Martin, various feces-related matters on the respective sets, and the type of people who make the movies he likes to be in.

episodes.title: Episode 179: Columbine Part Two - Creations, Exploitations, and Cover-Ups
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: On this, the conclusion of our Columbine series: we cover exactly how the myths of Columbine were created, how the Evangelical community exploited the tragedy, and how the entire thing could have been prevented and the cover-up that followed.

episodes.title: Episode 178: Columbine Part One - The Myth
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: On the first of this very special two parter, Last Podcast debunks the long standing myths concerning the perpetrators of the Columbine High School mass murder.

episodes.title: Episode 177: Mysterious Sounds and Recordings
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: This week we're exploring and listening to some of the most mysterious sounds ever recorded, including the Bloop, the Hum, the Phantom Cosmonaut, and the fascinating phenomenon of Number Stations.

episodes.title: Episode 176: Amityville Part Two - The Truth
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the actual truth behind The Amityville Horror today on Last Podcast as we go through all the more outrageous claims made by the Lutz family and refute each and every one, plus we'll hear more about what may or may not have happened the night of the actual murders from Ronnie DeFeo himself.

episodes.title: Episode 175: Amityville Part One - The Story
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the most famous haunting of all time on today's Last Podcast as we cover the accepted story of the 28 day haunting that the Lutzes experienced as portrayed in Jay Anson's The Amityville Horror and the mass murder that preceded it.

episodes.title: Episode 174: Ed Gein Part Three - Salted and Treated
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In the last of our three parter on Ed Gein, we cover the murder and mutilation of Bernice Worden and explore Ed's house of horrors, from the infamous nipple belt to his human skull bedposts.

episodes.title: Episode 173: Ed Gein Part Two - A Living Rainbow
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In part two of three about the original Psycho, Ed Gein, we cover his first lady murder with tavern owner Mary Hogan and the various graveyard antics that eventually resulted in midnight reveries while wearing homemade mammary vests, among other things.

episodes.title: Episode 172: Ed Gein Part One - Oddball
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's finally Gein time as we cover the origin of Wisconsin's real life bogeyman and just what his mother did to make Eddie Gein into the inspiration for Psycho, Texas Chainsaw Massacre, Silence of the Lambs, and countless others.

episodes.title: Episode 171: Serial Killers of the American Frontier
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's two tales of frontier madness this week as we cover Mickey and Wiley Harpe, the smelliest cave men to ever rampage across Kentucky, and Felipe Espinoza, whose body count positively dwarfs the notches on the gun of any wild west outlaw.

episodes.title: Episode 170: Betty and Barney Hill Part 2: Don't Think I Can't Take It
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: We wrap up the Betty and Barney Hill abduction with the terrifying hypnotherapy sessions, semen sucking suction cups, and Captain Swett's Book of Poetry.

episodes.title: Episode 169 - The Betty and Barney Hill Abduction Part 1: Concentric Circles
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's one of the first and possibly the most credible of all alien abductions this week with part one of the Betty and Barney Hill story.

episodes.title: Episode 168 - JonBenét Ramsey Part 2: The Last Bulb on the Christmas Tree
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The most bizarre conspiracy theories get a little light on the second part of our JonBenét Ramsey series as we cover her connections to 9/11, Satanic ritual abuse, and MK Ultra, as well as the reasons why the Ramsey's almost certainly didn't kill her.

episodes.title: Episode 167: JonBenét Ramsey Part 1 - And Hence
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's possibly America's most well-known unsolved murder on this week's Last Podcast two-parter as we analyze the circumstances surrounding the murder and the infamous ransom note.

episodes.title: Episode 166: Ed Kemper Part 2 - Momendorf
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: We wrap up our Ed Kemper two parter with all of his gruesome murders, from his copulation with the disconnected heads of his victims to the eventual treatment of his mother to the same fate.

episodes.title: Episode 165 - Ed Kemper Part 1: A Bit of a Bumblebutt
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Our Heavy Hitters series continues with Ed Kemper aka The Co-ed Killer! We start at the beginning with his locked-in-the-basement childhood, the cold-blooded murder of his grandparents, and the development of the methods he would eventually use to kill 6 young hitchhikers in the early seventies.

episodes.title: Episode 164: Playing with the Dead
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Whether you like to use them as Google or a variation on the Fleshlight, the dead are at your disposal on this episode of Last Podcast. It's necromancy, necrophilia, and the connection between the two.

episodes.title: Episode 163: Axe Murderers Part Two - Pinning Butterflies
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the second in our axe murder series as we cover the largest axe murder in the history of the United States (eight!) with the Villasca Murders and Karla Faye Tucker, the pickax biker who won the hearts and minds of America.

episodes.title: Episode 162: Axe Murderers Part One - Horse Owner and Horse
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In the first of our two parter on axe murders throughout history, we cover a story of a prostitute brutally murdered WITH AN AXE in olde New York and the story of Kate Webster, an Irishwoman who murdered her boss, dismembered the body, and threw the whole mess into the River Thames.

episodes.title: Episode161: Hollow Moon
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The moon. Is it hollow? Are there aliens inside? Is it even REAL? We answer all these questions and more on our exploration of Earth's very first satellite and the experts that maintain that the moon is definitely, absolutely, without a doubt, not what it seems.

episodes.title: Episode160: The Boston Strangler Murders Part 2: Shoes in the Shower
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the second part of the Boston Strangler Murders as we cover the two psychics who became entrenched in the search for the killer and both the likely and unlikely suspects of the murders including the man who took credit for it all but probably didn't do it: Albert DeSalvo.

episodes.title: Episode159: The Boston Strangler Murders Part 1: A Paranoia of Mother-Hate
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's a different kind of Heavy Hitter as we cover a series of brutal and bizarre murders that were almost certainly committed by no less than three people over a period of 18 months in Boston during the early sixties.

episodes.title: Episode158: Nazis and the Occult Part 2: White People Nerds
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: We end our series on the Nazi-Occult connection with it's most heinous evildoer, Heinrich Himmler, and the esoteric meanings behind the swastika.

episodes.title: Episode157: Nazis and the Occult Part 1: Severe and Annoying
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's part one of our coverage of the occult roots of the Nazi party, from the seemingly harmless teachings of Madame Helena Blavatsky to the nefarious Thule Society and beyond.

episodes.title: Episode156: The Coronado Group Abduction
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Aliens return with the Coronado Group Abduction, in which at least six people were abducted while attending a UFO convention on the same night in the same motel while Bill Clinton was in town. There's a lot to unpack here.

episodes.title: Episode155: 2014: The Year in Murder and Mayhem
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's our 2014 retrospective, as we cover the year's most murderous news stories from January to December, including spree stabbings, Brazillian serial killers, Irish baby graves, and mass fatal alcohol poisonings.

episodes.title: Episode154: The Dark Side of Santa Claus
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's the dark side of our lord and savior Santa Claus, from his supposed Satanic leanings to the horrifying wonder that is Christmas in Iceland.

episodes.title: Episode153: Fred and Rosemary West
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The Heavy Hitters series continues with the UK's (and possibly the world's) most depraved and sadistic man and wife team, Fred and Rosemary West.

episodes.title: Episode152: The Dylatov Pass Incident
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's one of the 20th century's most enduring mysteries, the Dylatov Pass incident! What killed nine hikers in the Siberian mountains one fateful night in 1959? Was it an avalanche? The KGB? Aliens? Indigenous peoples? Yetis? TINY TORNADOS? Listen to find out.

episodes.title: Episode151: Horrors of the UK
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: We cover a smattering of UK horrors, including Spring Heeled Jack, ghosts of World War I, and the Moors Murders!

episodes.title: Episode150: Monsters of the American Indian
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: We cover the world of Native American monsters, from the terrifying witches known as Skinwalkers to the mischevious, possibly murderous Mannegishi.

episodes.title: Episode149: Charles Manson Part 3: The Devil's Work
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: We wrap up our series on Charles Manson with the infamous Tate and LaBianca murders, the trial that followed, and the the life of Charles Manson since.

episodes.title: Episode148: Charles Manson Part 2: The Turning of the Worm
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Our series on Charles Manson continues with Manson's music, his relationship with Dennis Wilson of the Beach Boys and how a long list of unfortunate circumstances and coincidences led to the eventual murder of eight people.

episodes.title: Episode147: Charles Manson Part 1: An Incarcerated Life
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's part one of our three part series on Charles Manson! Today's episode brings you Charlie's upbringing in various correctional facilities, his rise as a sexual dynamo, and the beginnings of The Family.

episodes.title: Episode146: Creepypasta 9: Gjoberdik
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's Halloween creepypasta time again as we read stories about fake old ladies, hooker hair, and baseball murders, plus a bonus 911 call!

episodes.title: Episode145: Listnerpasta II: Brain Worms
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's time for our annual Listenerpasta episode with stories from you, the listener! This year we've got aliens abduction, blood puke, ghost stories from Afghanistan, and a childhood friend of spree killer Seung Cho.

episodes.title: Episode144: Halloween Breakdown
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's a Halloween grab bag this week as we get to stories involving some of our favorite subjects: possessions, hauntings, aliens, murder, and fetid rotting corpses by the hundreds.

episodes.title: Episode143: The Worst Ways to Die
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)

episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: We explore the career of one of America's most frightening and depraved serial killers, Dennis Rader aka B.T.K. Strangler. On this, the first episode of a two part series, we start with his emergence in 1974 with the Otero family killings and continue until the beginning of his first hiatus after the murder of Nancy Fox in 1977.

episodes.title: Episode58: Cobra, The Light Aliens, and You
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Henry explores his newest theory about the constant battle between the Reptilians who want to subjugate us and Codename: Cobra, the hero who represents the light aliens who only want the best for humankind and pyramids and crystals and the Queen of England plus yetis.

episodes.title: Episode57: Jesus
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In honor of the holiday season (which is now thankfully behind us), the boys explore the myth of Jesus and the three theories as to where the idea of the man came from. Lizards.

episodes.title: Episode56: A Maximillian LeBlanc Christmas
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Join us one of the great masters of horror cinema, Maximillian Blanc (James Adomian), as he regales us with with a special Christmas recitation.

episodes.title: Episode55: The Great Beast 666
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys explore the life of the Wickedest Man in the World and World Champion Power Bottom Aleister Crowley.

episodes.title: Episode54: Curses
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Henry returns from near death as we talk about all manner of curses, from Gypsy to Satanic to Biblical to Irish!

episodes.title: Episode53: The Toybox Killer
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: David Parker Ray, one of America's least known yet most brutal serial killers, has his sexually sadistic crimes explored by the boys.

episodes.title: Episode52: Project MK-Ultra
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Inspired by the Jimmy Saville BBC scandal, the boys explore the seedy world of the MK-Ultra program, including LSD experiments on mental patients, raping children for the purpose of creating super-spies, and the blackmailing of foreign dignitaries.

episodes.title: Episode51: Gucci and Dogs and HAARP
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys explore the phenomenon of super-storms, from the (true) claim that Obama used HAARP to create Hurricane Sandy in an attempt to sway the election (WHICH WORKED) to macabre details of the great Galveston hurricane of 1900 in which 8000 souls perished.

episodes.title: Episode50: 50th Episode Halloween Spooky Story Extravaganza!
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: On this special Halloween edition of Last Podcast: 4 of our friends come by to tell us the spookiest stories they've got the creep the hell outta ya when you're alone at night!

episodes.title: Episode49: Haunted House Adventure
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys go over the top five haunted houses in the world and take a trip to the famed Killers haunted house in New York City!

episodes.title: Episode48: 666: The List of the Beast
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In honor of our favorite upcoming holiday, the boys give their top 6 horror movies each!

episodes.title: Episode47: Origins of the Pyramids
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The origins of the pyramids are revealed! Join us as we explore different theories as to how these impossible structures will built, plus secrets of the Curse of King Tut's tomb are explored in depth. Surprisingly, it involves a canary.

episodes.title: Episode46: Cannibalism
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys discuss famous cannibals throughout history, particularly everyone's favorite, Mr. Albert Fish.

episodes.title: Episode45: Demon Hunters
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Demon hunters! They're real and out for action! Join us as we read passages from The Field Guide to Demons, explore the world of people who think they're in a constant battle with the forces of darkness, and discuss a trio of sexy sisters who perform exorcisms.

episodes.title: Episode44: A Smattering of Creepy
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Creepypasta returns! Today's Last Podcast brings you that and more, including a particularly disturbing site called Normal Porn for Normal People, the East Side Rapist, and the mysterious disappearances in America's national parks.

episodes.title: Episode43: Occult Symbols
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys explore the phenomenon of occult symbols in everyday life, Masonic numerology, and the facts behind the claim that the President is a Reptilian/Grey/Humanoid hybrid.

episodes.title: Episode42: Ghost, Alien, or Molested?
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys research ghost and alien stories on the internet to answer the burning question concerning most of them: was it a ghost or an alien, or their grandpa?

episodes.title: Episode41: Our Psychic Powers
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys test their psychic abilities. The results...are disturbing!

episodes.title: Episode40: The Alien Agenda
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys explore the vast alien agenda threatening the human race and everything you hold dear!

episodes.title: Episode39: Hail Satan!
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys explore the many facets of Satan and Satanism, including the origins of the myth, how extremely misinformed people are about the concept of Satanism, and Satanic clubs throughout the centuries.

episodes.title: Episode38: Erratic Behavior
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Our conversation of the impending apocalypse continues as new stories of cannibalism surface and previously covered stories reveal more disturbing details.

episodes.title: Episode37: The Zombie Apocalypse is Upon Us
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: You've read the story of the face-eating man, now hear all the alarming facts surrounding the case! From the rash of mysterious happenings around Florida in the surrounding areas to the extreme effects of snorting bath salts, LPOTL is delving into the world of real-life zombies for your frightening pleasure.

episodes.title: Episode36: Sandwiches in the Matrix
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Glitches in the matrix, masturbation sigils, and the writings of Philip K. Dick!

episodes.title: Episode35: There's Bones In The Chocolate
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys explore the world of mentally challenged serial killers.

episodes.title: Episode34: Heaven's Gate
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys explore the Heaven's Gate incident and the man behind it all, Marshall Applewhite.

episodes.title: Episode33: 1-800-Suicide
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys discuss suicide, how fucking stupid it is, and how hilarious it can be.

episodes.title: Episode32: Biological and Chemical Warfare
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The Last Podcasters explore the subject of biological and chemical warfare, from ye olde smallpox to today's weaponized ebola.

episodes.title: Episode31: Texas Executions
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Today's LPOTL delves into that most fascinating of subjects, the executed criminals of Texas. From Charles Rumbaugh and his prison escapes to Karla Faye Tucker and her pick-axe, we got 'em all!

episodes.title: Episode30: The March Madness of Killers!
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: March Madness is in full swing and the Last Podcast is here to give you their very own version: killers both real and imagined, head to head in a tournament to the death for your entertainment!

episodes.title: Episode29: Reincarnation
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Henry, Ben, and Marcus discuss the concept of reincarnation and guide you through your very own past life regression!

episodes.title: Episode28: Families Are Tough
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: The boys explore the phenomenon of families who kill, whether it be each other or the people around them.

episodes.title: Episode27: Torture
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: From the baddassery of Medieval Times (The Pear, The Breast Ripper, The Iron Maiden) to today's relatively weak CIA techniques (The Belly Slap, The Attention Grabber, Waterboarding), we cover it all on today's Last Podcast On The Left.

episodes.title: Episode26: 911
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Ben, Henry, and Marcus delve into the gruesome world of actual 911 calls. Warning: this episode is not for the faint of heart.

episodes.title: Episode25: Monsters
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: On this special 25th episode edition, Ben, Henry, and Marcus begin their series on regional monsters starting with the big three, Bigfoot, Chupacabra, and The Mothman.

episodes.title: Episode24: Friendly Ghosts
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Join the boys this week as they fail miserably at an attempt at a lighthearted show about friendly ghosts. When it's all said and done, Casper is still a dead child.

episodes.title: Episode23: Real Life Bogeymen: Child Molesters
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Seeing as how pedophiles are somehow in vogue right now, the Last Podcast boys decided to devote an entire episode to these real life bogeymen and their plans to stop them forever. Put 'em in the mines!

episodes.title: Episode21: The Illuminati
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's a helluva time on The Last Podcast today as the Ben and Henry give the rundown on that most secret of societies, The Illuminati! And hoo boy, we got a doozy of a special guest today: former Minnesota governor and conspiracy theory expert, Jesse "The Body" Ventura!

episodes.title: Episode20: Spontaneous Human Combustion
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Spontaneous human combustion! Is it something you should be afraid of? Tune in this week to hear us discuss this mysterious phenomenon.

episodes.title: Episode19: Ghost Bustin'
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Field trip time! Join us this week as Henry, Ben, and Marcus travel to their friend Natalie's house to bust the poltergeist that's been terrorizing her for the last year or so.

episodes.title: Episode18: The Abducted
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: On this very special episode, Ben, Henry, and Marcus welcome actual alien abductee and author Jeremy Vaeni into the studio to discuss his experiences with the creatures from beyond.

episodes.title: Episode17: Ghost Hunters
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Damn near as bad as TV psychics. Tune in this week to hear our opinions on the terrible world that is ghost hunter TV shows. Bullshit each and every one! Ghosts are still real, though.

episodes.title: Episode16: Creepypasta
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: It's story time! On this episode, Ben, Henry, and Marcus read to you and discuss some of the creepiest stories they can find on the internet, including one of the best on out there, Barbie.avi.

episodes.title: Episode15: Hoodoo Voodoo
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Voodoo! Tune in this week as special correspondent Kiki Kapral returns from New Orleans on a voodoo expedition to talk about her interview with an actual voodoo priestess, plus we talk about Haitian voodoo and the anthropological study and subsequent movie starring Bill Pullman known as The Serpent and The Rainbow.

episodes.title: Episode14: Chasing the Boogeyman Part Two: The Boogeyman Within
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In this, the second in a three part series to find the boogeyman, we look inside ourselves for the psychopath lurking in our own souls. Special guest Molly Knefel comes in to administer a test to see exactly who the biggest sociopath on Last Podcast actually is. I think you already know who it is.

episodes.title: Episode13: Chasing The Boogeyman Part One: Son of Sam
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In this, the first in a three part series to find the real New York boogeyman, we travel out to Forest Hills for our second field trip to the site of the murders of victims 4 and 5 of the Son of Sam himself, David Berkowitz! We even brought our own bait.

episodes.title: Episode12: The Psychic Journey
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: Join us on the very first Last Podcast On The Left field trip as we search the East Village of New York City for a psychic worth a damn, plus resident psychic and tarot card expert and stand-up comedian Subhah Agarwal comes in to give us the skinny on the whole business.

episodes.title: Episode11: Exorcisms!
episodes.author: marcus.j.parks@gmail.com (Cave Comedy Radio)
episodes.summary: In the second installment of our continuing ghost/demon series, we delve into the world of exorcisms, specifically the case of Anneliese Michel, featuring actual audio footage of her exorcism!
